Éditeur de position et échiquier d\'analyse avec %s

string.name: allChessBasicsLessons
string.comment:
Chess basics in this context is discussing https://lichess.org/learn - a complete course on how to play chess for complete beginners.
This is string appears as a feature listed on the https://lichess.org/features page.

resources.string: Problèmes tactiques tirés des parties d\'un joueur

string.name: personalOpeningExplorerX
string.comment:
%1$s is "Personal opening explorer" %2$s is "other players"
Full sentence: "Personal opening explorer (also works on other players)"
The opening explorer lets you see the frequency and performance across different openings you play. You can use the feature to look at other players' games as well.
This is string appears as a feature listed on the https://lichess.org/features page. The Features page has a humorous comparison, which demonstrates the features of Lichess and indicates which features free and paying members can access respectively. The joke is that both have the same feature, as Lichess is a fully free service. The sole difference is that patrons can optionally have a wing as their online status indicator.

string.name: personalOpeningExplorer
string.comment:
Part of a longer string, "Personal opening explorer (also works on other players)"
Opening explorer refers to the feature described here: https://lichess.org/@/lichess/blog/opening-explorer/Vs0xMTAA We state 'personal' as it can also look at the player's own games, and other players' games.
This is string appears as a feature listed on the https://lichess.org/features page.

string.name: globalOpeningExplorerInNbGames
string.comment: %s is the total number of games in the Lichess opening explorer.

resources.string: Blogue, forum, équipes, TV, messagerie, amis, défis
Thème clair/sombre, échiquier, pièces et arrière-plan personnalisés
Partie : UltraBullet, Bullet, Blitz, Rapide, Classique, par correspondance
Toutes les fonctionnalités à venir, et pour toujours!
Appareils iPhone, appareils et tablettes Android et soutien en mode paysage
Versez un don à Lichess et obtenez une belle icône Mécène
Oui, les deux comptes ont les mêmes fonctionnalités.

string.name: weBelieveEveryChessPlayerDeservesTheBest
string.comment: This is followed by the sentence "All features are free for everybody, forever!"

resources.string: Nous croyons que chaque joueur d\'échecs mérite ce qu\'il y a de mieux – donc :
Toutes les fonctionnalités sont gratuites pour tous, pour toujours!

string.name: ifYouLoveLichess
string.comment: The sentence continues with a button saying "Support us with a Patron account!"

string.name: supportUsWithAPatronAccount
string.comment: A button at the bottom of https://lichess.org/features, which takes users to the donation page.
